original_text: So it came to pass in the day of battle, that there was neither sword nor spear found in the hand of any of the people that were with Saul and Jonathan: but with Saul and with Jonathan his son was there found.
korean_text: 싸우는 날에 사울과 요나단과 함께 한 백성의 손에는 칼이나 창이 없고 오직 사울과 그의 아들 요나단에게만 있었더라

sentences.original_text: So it came to pass in the day of battle
that there was neither sword nor spear found
in the hand of any of the people
that were with Saul and Jonathan
but with Saul and with Jonathan his son
